mapper.select: select a.*, IFNULL(cnt, 0) as cnt FROM room_tb a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT room_no, COUNT(*) cnt FROM reservation_tb group by room_no ) b ON a.room_no = b.room_no WHERE seller_no = #{sellerNo};
SELECT a.reservation_no, a.reservation_date, a.start_time, a.end_time, b.member_id FROM reservation_tb a INNER JOIN member_tb b ON a.member_no = b.member_no WHERE a.room_no = #{roomNo};

select a.*, COALESCE(b.roptionimage_no, 0) as roptionimage_no, COALESCE(b.original_name, 'none') as original_name, COALESCE(b.save_name, 'none') as save_name, COALESCE(b.file_size, 0) as file_size, COALESCE(b.file_delete, 'N') as file_delete, COALESCE(b.upload_date, '0101-01-01') as upload_date FROM roomoption_tb a LEFT JOIN roomoptionimage_tb b ON a.roption_no = b.roption_no WHERE a.room_no = #{roomNo}
SELECT roomimage_no, original_name, save_name, file_size, thumbnail, file_delete, upload_date FROM roomimage_tb WHERE room_no = #{roomNo} AND file_delete = 'N' AND thumbnail = 'Y'
SELECT roomimage_no, original_name, save_name, file_size, thumbnail, file_delete, upload_date FROM roomimage_tb WHERE room_no = #{roomNo} AND file_delete = 'N' AND thumbnail = 'N'

update.foreach: UPDATE roomoption_tb SET roption_title = #{roomOption.roptionTitle}, roption_content = #{roomOption.roptionContent}, roption_price = #{roomOption.roptionPrice} WHERE roption_no = #{roomOption.roptionNo}
